title: Valentine''s Day of a ''Single'' Chennai Male

comments.author: vijay03
comments.content: Machi. Desperate post da. Paathalae theriyathu. Dont worry. Avlo thaan :P And athu mathulik, mahalik illa :P Nee pink chaddi campaign paakala nu nenaikaran, athaan atha vitutu, etha pathi ezhuthura :P
